physical_examinations.relevant_findings: GEN: mildly uncomfortable; HEENT: No scleral icterus, mucus membranes moist; CV: RRR, No M/G/R; PULM: Clear to auscultation b/l, No W/R/R; ABD: Soft, TTP in the RLQ, no evidence of Rovsing's sign; Ext: No edema, warm and well perfused.
